name: counts
description: Commands about the counts in the guild

options.name: create
options.description: Creates a new counter. Each time a word or regex pattern is used, the counter increases by one.

options.name: match
options.description: The word or regex pattern to count.

options.name: react
options.description: Should I react to messages that trigger a count? Overrides the next options.

options.name: random-emoji
options.description: React with a random server emoji. I'll try to match your pattern, or use ✅ if I can't.

options.name: custom-emoji
options.description: Specify a custom emoji to react with. Overrides "Random Emoji".

options.name: delete
options.description: Deletes a specific count from this guild.

options.name: match
options.description: The word or regex pattern to search for.

options.name: edit
options.description: Edit an existing counter's emoji and reaction settings.

options.name: match
options.description: The word or regex pattern to search for.

options.name: react
options.description: Update whether I should react to matching messages. Overrides emoji options.

options.name: random-emoji
options.description: Update if I should react with a random emoji. Falls back to ✅ if no match.

options.name: custom-emoji
options.description: Update the custom emoji used for reactions. This overrides the random emoji setting.

options.name: list
options.description: Lists all the current counts in this guild.

options.name: created-by
options.description: Filter counts created by this user.

name: download
description: Download a video or audio via yt-dlp

options.name: url
options.description: The URL of the video or audio to download.

options.name: preset
options.description: Select a pre-configured format. (Default: Best Quality (Discord-Optimized))

options.name: custom-options
options.description: Supply your own yt-dlp flags. These will be applied after any selected preset.

options.name: quantity
options.description: Quantity of messages to delete

options.name: user
options.description: User to delete messages from

options.name: channel
options.description: Channel to delete messages from
